edu.matc.service

Class AffirmationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.matc.service.AffirmationService

  • @Path(value="/affirmationservice")
public class AffirmationService
extends java.lang.Object
    The affirmation web service class that defines the endpoints for the affirmation api webservice
    Since:
    10/27/16
    Author:
    Todd Kinsman

      • createAffirmation

        @POST
 @Path(value="/affirmations")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public java.lang.String createAffirmation(@FormParam(value="affirmationId")
                                                                                                                                                                         int affirmationId,
                                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="phrase")
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String phrase,
                                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="categoryId")
                                                                                                                                                                         int categoryid,
                                                                                                                                                                         @Context
                                                                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse servletResponse)
                                                                                                                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Function for endpoint to add affiraiton to affirmation table, not yet available to endusers
        Parameters:
        affirmationId - int of affirmation to add, to be deprecated.
        phrase - text phrase to add.
        categoryid - int the id of the category to add to. Will change to human readable in next version.
        Returns:
        String success or failure
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • upvoteAffirmation

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/affirmations/upvote/{affirmationId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response upvoteAffirmation(@PathParam(value="affirmationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                        int affirmationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        @Context
                                                                                                                                                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse servletResponse)
                                                                                                                                                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Function for endpoint to update an affirmation rating given id. Rating will be incremented by 1.
        Parameters:
        affirmationId - int of affirmation to update
        Returns:
        affirmation Affirmation incremented
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • downvoteAffirmation

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/affirmations/downvote/{affirmationId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response downvoteAffirmation(@PathParam(value="affirmationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                            int affirmationId)
                                                                                                                                                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Function for endpoint to update an affirmation rating given id. Rating will be decremented by 1.
        Parameters:
        affirmationId - int of affirmation to downvote
        Returns:
        affirmation Affirmation decremented
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
